code: import React from'react';import Buttons from'./Buttons';import Hours from'./Hours';import Minutes from'./Minutes';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Min2Hour(){const[amount,setAmount]=React.useState(0);const[flipped,setFlipped]=React.useState(false);const onChange=event=>setAmount(event.target.value);const onReset=()=>setAmount(0);const onFlip=()=>{onReset();setFlipped(flipped=>!flipped);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Minutes to Hours"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Hours,{flipped:flipped,onChange:onChange,amount:amount}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:["You want to convert from ",amount," ",flipped?"hours":"minutes"," to:"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Minutes,{flipped:flipped,onChange:onChange,amount:amount}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Buttons,{onReset:onReset,onFlip:onFlip})]});}export default Min2Hour;
